doctor.specialty: Orthopedics (Bone, Joint, Trauma, Arthritis) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Kabiruzzaman is a Orthopedic Surgeon in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, D-ORTHO, PhD (Ortho Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Orthopedic Surgery at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Kabiruzzaman at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal is 3pm to 4pm (Closed: Friday).
